channel.title: Jay Aspin
channel.description: Recent news about Jay Aspin, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Rushing back from my Montreal Aerospace Tour to answer all the calls asking why Justin Trudeau thinks he is above the law

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Huge thank you to FedNor Minister Greg Rickford for creating 38 well needed jobs on his first official visit to Nipissing-Timiskaming

item.title: Posted on Twitter

item.title: Posted on Twitter

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Pleased to support the Rotaract Club of Nipissing's Up the Creek without a Paddle fundraiser for a great cause helping kids in need

item.title: Mentioned by Canadian Skies
item.description:
Government of Canada invests in safety at Greater Sudbury Airport
Jay Aspin, Member of Parliament for Nipissing—Timiskaming, on behalf of the Honourable Denis Lebel, Minister of Transport, Infrastructure and Communities, Minister of the Economic Development Agency of Canada for the Regions of Quebec, and Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs, on July 11 announced more than $3 million in ... “As Vice-Chair of the Aerospace Caucus it has been a priority of mine to work with the government in strengthening our regional aerospace infrastructure and industry,” said MP Aspin.
